eventDecorators.name: AcceptBid
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: Bid
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: SetSalePrice
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: Sold
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

functionDecorators.name: acceptBid
functionDecorators.description: Accept the bid on the token.

parameterDecorators.name: _originContract
parameterDecorators.description: address of the contract storing the token.

functionDecorators.name: bid
functionDecorators.description: Bids on the token, replacing the bid if the bid is higher than the current bid. You cannot bid on a token you already own.

parameterDecorators.name: _newBidAmount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 value in wei to bid, plus marketplace fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _originContract
parameterDecorators.description: address of the contract storing the token.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: Purchases the token if it is for sale.

parameterDecorators.name: _originContract
parameterDecorators.description: address of the contract storing the token.

functionDecorators.name: currentBidDetailsOfToken
functionDecorators.description: Function to get current bid and bidder of a token.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setMarketplaceFee
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the marketplace fee percentage.

parameterDecorators.name: _percentage
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 fee to take from purchases.

functionDecorators.name: setPrimarySaleFee
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the primary sale fee percentage.

parameterDecorators.name: _percentage
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 fee to take from purchases.

functionDecorators.name: setRoyaltyFee
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the royalty fee percentage.

parameterDecorators.name: _percentage
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 royalty fee to take split between seller and creator.

parameterDecorators.name: _originContract
parameterDecorators.description: address of the contract storing the token.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 wei value that the item is for sale.

functionDecorators.name: tokenPrice
functionDecorators.description: Gets the sale price of the token.

parameterDecorators.name: _originContract
parameterDecorators.description: address of the contract storing the token.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
